artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape view with foreground figures on a path; three trees with pink blossoms in foreground; building and tower in center background, with mountain peak at left; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Sumida Riverbank in Edo from the series "36 Views of Mt. Fuji"
